pr_title: Add operations on cursors to EncryptResultSet(Suitable for a single data source) by originalResultSet

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from apache/master

更新

Add operations on cursors to EncryptResultSet(Suitable for a single data source) by originalResultSet, including the following APIs:

previous()
isBeforeFirst()
isAfterLast()
isFirst()
isLast()
beforeFirst()
afterLast()
first()
last()
absolute(final int row)
relative(final int rows)
getRow()
